name: Weakpoint Delta
storyline: Use the skills of timing, triangulation and precision, that you totally have, to mine asteroids and collect the crystals within. Use said crystals to get upgrades to make it easier to mine and the equipment needed to mine new, dangerous, but valuable asteroids. All while trying to pay off your crippling debt.
summary: Asteroids go boom. Zoom around in your lil' ship and learn how to accurately hit weakpoints on asteroids to extract the precious crystals within allowing you to purchase upgrades.
